resources.string: Tyler Gregory Okonma (born March 6, 1991), commonly known by his stage name Ty ler, the Creator, is an American rapper, record producer,and music video director. He rose to prominence as the co-founder and de facto leader of the alternative hip hop
The wolf (Canis lupus), also known as the gray wolf, timber wolf, western wolf, and its other subspecies is a canine native to the wilderness and remote areas of Eurasia and North America.

Pokémon (Japanese: ポケモン Hepburn: Pokemon, Japanese: [pokemoɴ]; English: /ˈpoʊkɪˌmɒn, -ki-, -keɪ-/), also known as Pocket Monsters (ポケットモンスター) in Japan, is a Japanese media franchise managed by The Pokémon Company,
